course.title: Early Christian Thought 1: The Greek Tradition
course.meeting_text: Tu., Th., 11:30–1 and hour to be arranged.
course.description: This introductory course will focus on the major Greek authors of the late antique Christian East (third through eighth centuries). Authors will include Origen, Antony the Great, Athanasius, Basil of Caesarea, Gregory of Nazianzus, Gregory of Nyssa, Evagrius of Pontus, Cyril of Alexandria, Pseudo-Dionysius the Areopagite, Maximus the Confessor, and John of Damascus.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1749.
